objects.specification: Large flat rectangular floor for the fair booth, measuring approximately ten meters by ten meters with a minimal thickness, featuring a smooth matte finish in a soft neutral gray tone that provides a clean and unobtrusive surface, suitable for showcasing a demo car and accommodating visitor traffic.

Simple and clean enclosure walls for the fair booth, each being a three-meter tall panel with a smooth neutral light gray surface, forming a cohesive backdrop that encloses the space while maintaining an open entrance, minimalistic in style to focus attention on exhibit items.

A sleek modern exhibition demo car in a bold bright red color with smooth aerodynamic shapes and refined contours, featuring realistic proportions of approximately four and a half meters in length and two meters in width, designed to draw attention and highlight the vehicle’s design in the booth.

A rectangular registration desk with clean modern lines, approximately two meters wide, one meter deep, and one meter high, in a crisp white finish, providing a welcoming interaction point for visitors with a minimalistic style.

A contemporary minimalist display stand with a rectangular platform approximately one meter wide and half a meter deep, finished in clean white, featuring simple supportive legs, ideal for showcasing brochures or miniatures with an unobtrusive design.

A tall and narrow standing information banner measuring around two and a half meters in height and one meter wide, with a vibrant bold color, featuring smooth panel surfaces and clear graphic display areas to convey informative content prominently.

A small round table with a smooth circular top of about one meter diameter and a sturdy central column support of half meter height, finished in a neutral tone, providing comfortable gathering points for visitors while maintaining open walkways.

A comfortable visitor chair with a supportive backrest, seat height of approximately one meter including legs, and a compact footprint of half meter width and depth, featuring simple modern styling suitable for exhibition seating.

A ceiling spotlight modeled as a small cylindrical luminaire, about two decimeters in diameter and half meter in length, featuring a clean white metal finish that suggests illumination, designed to hang from above and focus light on key areas.
